mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BSK (SEQ_BSK, SEQ_MBR, SEQ_SLE, SLE_NM, PRICE, COUNT, IMG, POINT_VALUE, FLG_DELETE, DT_REG) VALUES (SQ_SEQ_BSK.NEXTVAL, #{seq_mbr}, #{seq_sle}, #{sle_nm}, #{price}, #{count}, #{img}, #{point_value}, 'N', SYSDATE)
